meanings.definition: The fleshy extension at the back of the soft palate in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The uvulae helps prevent food from going up the nose.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her uvulae during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: When she laughed, her uvulae wiggled like a tiny jellyfish.
meanings.sent4: In the dark, her uvulae felt like a mysterious little creature in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The uvulae is like a tiny punching bag in the back of your mouth.
